description: When no documentation is installed, the application is very confusing. It just opens up with "Empty page", a white page, an empty sidebar and... nothing else. I'm not really sure what to do (how do I "get" documentation?), so it would be nice to have some sort of informational when this happens.
summary: Confusing when no documentation is installed

description:
A GtkDoc browser, for software developers. It's usually much easier to look up APIs using Devhelp than by searching the web for them.

But there is one very big problem: it's very difficult to install new documentation. You have to do so using the command line. That's not good.

It has been broken for C++ stuff documentation etc. for years now, 
but seems to work fine for C and other stuff, why i gave it 3 stars.

When it worked with the C++ stuff documentation etc., i used it a lot !
Its shows an empty page and I cant really see any API docs
Doesn't ship with any documentation whatsoever and no option of downloading it. So just shows an empty application that doesn't do anything.
